text:
Created attachment 25774
patch to fix error in fop.xconf

fop.xconf has default page width of 8.26 inches for US letter, should be 8.50 inches; patch attached generated at trunk dir by command:

  svn diff > fop.xconf.patch
creator: tom.browder@gmail.com
adelmelle@apache.org
text: The default page-width is not supposed to be that of either US letter or A4. The XSL-FO Recommendation actually suggests using a mixture of both, so that, when no explicit dimensions are supplied, the content would neatly fit either format when sent to a printer, without any scaling or clipping.
batch transition to closed for remaining resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
